name: Color Maze Pro: Accelerometer game
description:
We present to you: Color Maze!

Control the main Character with the accelerometer!
Walkthrough the color maze with gravity, do not fall into the trap!
Dial the maximum depth in the shortest time!

Features:
- easy control
- nice interface
- sometimes you need to think
- suitable for adults and children
- game has checkpoints

---
// The game works perfectly on iPhone 5 and above (aspect ratio 16: 9)
